journal-sync.Settings.Title: Journal Sync settings
journal-sync.MarkdownSourcePath.Name: Markdown Source Path
journal-sync.MarkdownSourcePath.Hint: The path to the markdown files under the Foundry Data folder, it is 'journal-sync' by default
journal-sync.SyncWorldPath.Name: [Advanced] Sync World Path
journal-sync.SyncWorldPath.Hint: The world path relative to the Markdown Source Path to synchronize to/from. Defaults to game name.
journal-sync.JournalEditorLink.Name: Journal Editor Link
journal-sync.JournalEditorLink.Hint: Link to the editor you use to update the Journal Markdown. For example a hosted VSCode instance
journal-sync.EnableTracing.Name: Enable Tracing
journal-sync.EnableTracing.Hint: Increases the logging to the browser console for debugging
journal-sync.SkipJournalFolders.Name: Skip Journal Folder Import/Export
journal-sync.SkipJournalFolders.Hint: List folders you do not want to import/export. Comma delimited.
journal-sync.SkipJournalEntries.Name: Skip Journal Entry Import/Export
journal-sync.SkipJournalEntries.Hint: List Journal entries you do not want to import/export. Comma delimited.
